name: DoDodge2020
description:
DoDodge2020 is a simple bullet dodge game.
play and get coins to unlock more customizable content.
build your own game experience with different scene, character, skill, enemy, system, etc.

Dodge Enemys

Customizable

Content

  • 4 character skin.
  • 10 unique movement skill.
  • 30 customizable content in total.
